lines.text: Colonel Marcus?
Merry Christmas.
My name is Safir, and my business is private.
Bert Harrison, my law partner. Mr. Safir, who conducts his private business in Macy's window.
Would you give up everything you love to fight an insane war for a little country that's gonna get its brains blown out in a couple of weeks?
If it were my country.
Maybe it's yours, but... it isn't mine.
But you are a Jew.
I'm an American, Major. That's my religion. The last time I was in Temple I was 13 years old. I made a speech and got 42 fountain pens. I don't have to go again. I've got enough fountain pens.
Colonel, I'm asking you, as an American. What do you say in your schools when you salute your flag? "Liberty and justice for all"? Is it only for all of you?
Don't give me history lessons!
Six million of our people have recently been murdered. Would you like us to try for seven?
I guess I'm proud of you. But I'm so damn tired of being proud of you.
Did you ever notice we don't have any children?
Only me.
I was the only girl in Brooklyn who didn't get pregnant during the war.
Hm?
My mother kept the statistics.
Suppose I go as a private citizen?
Then don't involve the Army in any way. Don't use your rank or even your right name.
Is it all right with you if I keep the same sex?
Michael! Michael! Oh, Mike... It's so good to see you after so long... I'm sorry. I'm very late. How are you?
How do I look?
Tired, like you've been making love to all the girls in America.
Eh, it's good to be back!
From now on, I'm your sister.
Hmm, that's nice. What's the attitude on incest in this country?
Very biblical. Especially since I'm also married. My husband is an officer in the Palmach... But you can try if you wish.
Remember, if we are stopped by a British patrol, we are off for a weekend in the country.
And you are my sister.
Do you have good sex with your wife?
What goes on in that pretty head of yours?
Andre's not very good in bed.
Well, just close your eyes and tell the doctor everything.

When you were 3 years old, I was stealing cattle from your father. There was a man! A lion! He shot me twice, and we came to an agreement of gentlemen. I was a guest in your house. I held you on my knee. Twice you wet your pants and mine. You have no honor.
It was an old Bedouin friend of my father's. I thought he died long ago.
Hush, hush, I'm far from dead. You can ask that bag of fat who just danced for us.
Ram Oren, don't wet your pants again.
You know they have artillery. You don't even have armor.
This dynamite is our artillery, and the night is our armor.
And the Lord is my Shepherd. but I've always thought that maybe he's their shepherd, too.
You stay.
If so, there'll be a hell of a lot of confused sheep.
They told you, I suppose, that I have a terrible temper.
I served in Germany under General "blood-and-guts" Patton. You're a pussycat.
The olive branch hasn't worked around here since Noah ran the ark into a mountain.
Next week, he's going in a convoy to Jerusalem. And he's dictating from memory every army training manual he can remember. He says they need it more than the Bible.
Did he happen to mention who he's dictating the Song of Solomon to?
Why do you let women to go on these convoys?
Magda volunteered.
She's been through enough. She just lost her husband, she's in a terrible st...
Look, we need everyone. Especially since the British search us for weapons. Being British, they're also too polite most of the time to search a woman thoroughly.
You're lucky you're not occupied by the French.
You know, I'll bet if Moses came down from Mount Sinai again, the Palmach would turn down five of the Commandments just so God wouldn't get a swelled head.
And now, God help them, 'cause that's all the help they'll get from us.
Hey, don't leave me here! I'm anti-Semitic!
You've got no choice. Hit those tanks with everything.
Risk the entire force?
They don't know it's a whole force! Go for broke. This has gotta be the biggest bluff since the invention of falsies.
Who is this idiot? If one of my men talked to me like that, I would draw my knife and turn him into a eunuch.
Not familiar with these hills? I was having women in these hills when your father was still sucking milk.
What's the matter, soldier? Haven't you ever jumped before?
No-OOOOOOOHHHHHHHhhhhhhh!

If I were running the Pentagon, I'd have you stood up against the wall. Instead, they'll probably pin a medal on you. Have you ever heard of the word *discipline*? A staff officer acting like a kid playing Cowboys-and-Indians is an example that could cost a hundred lives. What are you trying to prove, Marcus?
I wish the h__l I knew, sir.
Give this insubordinate s_n-of-a-b___h every truck and every blanket in the Third Army. And I don't care who you have to steal them from!

[Vince is sitting in his spotter plane with the engine running when the waiter hands him bottles of seltzer water]
What's this for?
A trick we learned from the Stukas in the other war. It's like a whistle. It screams on the way down.
That's great. That'll make two of us.
